text: Towradgi is a small suburb, north of Wollongong. It is on the coast and close to beaches. == Attractions == It has a school, soccer fields, a lawn-bowling field, and many other attractions. It has a few restaurants/dining places. ==Sources== ==Other websites== *Towradgi Surf Life Saving Club, NSW Australia *Towradgi Beach Hotel *Towradgi Community Web Portal Category:Settlements in New South Wales Category:Wollongong
title: Towradgi
